entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • The URL for downloading the .NET runtime when starting a fx-dependent app is incorrect #33435
  • AOT compiling/publishing from Visual Studio post build event create endless loop of dotnet calls #32512
  • NETSDK1206 should not be flagging 'browser' RID platform #33579
    .NET 8.0
  • dotnet pack fails using UseArtifactsOutput=true with multi-targeting and global usings #32675

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • First run experience always runs with `sudo` #32619
    Discussion
  • dotnet new globaljson should have allowPrerelease option #32500
  • German umlauts aren't displayed correctly for at least dotnet tool restore #32494
  • Cannot build/restore maccatalyst targeting .net6 due to missing package #33530
    Discussion
  • Test project on Mac complain about not having windows target (NETSDK1136) #32480
    Discussion
  • `wasi-experimental` doesn't support Linux Arm64 #32686
  • dotnet store fails because of content files (Microsoft.NET.ComposeStore.targets(345,5): error MSB3024) #32942
    Discussion
  • Windows runtimes are showing in Linux SDK tarball #33472
  • Secrets Management in different Environments #33241
    Backlog
  • Regression - ctrl-c handling commit from old dotnet/cli repo not merged into this repo #33417
    Discussion
  • Installing maui-ios Workload on Mac Fails #33631
  • NETSDK1206 error when building the aspnetcore repo with latest 8.0 Preview 6 SDK build #33486
  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993
  • Provide a way to turn off Diagnostic Tracing in projects #11530
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33635
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix printed version for APICompat.Tool and GenAPI.Tool #33619
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Add explicit System.Text.Json dependency #33618
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Update .gitignore to ignore .env files #33305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set XLF files to be collapsed by default in PR reviews #33511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make non-portable RID warning check all available NETCore.App RIDS for the current TFM #33621
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Make non-portable RID warning check all available NETCore.App RIDS for the current TFM #33584
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #33572
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2210554 #33590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Containers release notes #33537
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Move wait and result calls to the thread pool to avoid deadlocks. #33586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
